name: Black Longsword
description: A sleek and deadly sword with a jet-black blade.
looks: The Black Longsword is a beautifully crafted weapon with a long, slender blade made from a mysterious black metal. The hilt is wrapped in black leather, providing a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.lethality: Chance to inflict a lethal blow.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Sturdy gauntlets made of steel, providing excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets cover the entire hand and lower forearm, with articulated plates allowing for flexibility and movement. They have a polished silver finish and are adorned with intricate engravings.

name: Windblade
description: A mystical sword imbued with the power of the wind.
looks: The Windblade has a long, slender blade made of shimmering silver metal. The hilt is wrapped in soft blue leather and adorned with intricate wind symbols.

special_weapon_skills.wind_attack: Allows the wielder to unleash powerful wind-based attacks.

special_effects.wind_mastery: Increases the effectiveness of wind-based spells and abilities.

name: Steel Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet made of steel
looks: The helmet is made of smooth steel with a silver tint. It has a visor that can be opened and closed.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Sturdy gauntlets made of steel that provide excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of polished steel with intricate engravings along the edges. They have articulated fingers for flexibility and reinforced plating on the knuckles.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the Fireball spell, which unleashes a fiery explosion upon its target.
looks: The Fireball Scroll is a rolled-up parchment with intricate symbols and runes drawn in red ink. It emits a faint heat and faintly glows with fire.

special_effects.cast_fireball: Allows the user to cast the Fireball spell.

name: Adamantium Sword
description: A legendary sword made from the rare and powerful metal, adamantium.
looks: The Adamantium Sword is a long and sleek weapon with a razor-sharp blade. The handle is wrapped in black leather for a comfortable grip.

special_effects.bleed: Has a chance to inflict a bleeding effect on enemies.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Staff of Fire
description: A powerful staff infused with the essence of fire magic.
looks: The Staff of Fire is made of polished mahogany, with intricate carvings along its length. At the top, there is a crystal orb that glows with a fiery light.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Increases damage and effectiveness of fire magic spells.

name: Dagger of the Shadows
description: A small, sharp dagger imbued with the essence of darkness. It is favored by assassins and rogues for its stealthy nature.
looks: The Dagger of the Shadows has a black blade made of an unknown material that seems to absorb light. Its hilt is wrapped in dark leather, providing a comfortable grip. The pommel is adorned with a small black gem.

special_effects.stealth: Grants a bonus to Stealth skill when wielded.

name: Staff of Fire
description: A powerful staff imbued with the essence of fire.
looks: The Staff of Fire is a tall wooden staff with intricate carvings of flames and embers. It has a crystal orb at the top that glows with a fiery red light.

special_weapon_skils.fire_magic: Increases damage done by fire spells.

special_effects.burn: Has a chance to ignite enemies on fire with each attack.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made from steel.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of solid steel with a polished surface. They have a fingerless design with metal plates covering the back of the hand and fingers.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Diamond Sword
description: A powerful weapon forged from pure diamonds.
looks: The Diamond Sword has a shiny silver blade that sparkles in the light. The hilt is encrusted with diamonds and has an engraved pattern of swirling lines.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Golden Gauntlets
description: A pair of gauntlets made from solid gold. They provide excellent protection for the hands and fingers.
looks: The Golden Gauntlets are intricately engraved with ornate patterns and designs. The polished gold gleams in the light, giving them a regal appearance.
